text: (What should I get for a treat...!)
(I wonder which one Kaho is in the mood for today...!)

(The traditional Japanese sweets shop is over there, right?
  And there was a limited-time donut shop──)

(...If there were dorayaki donuts or something like that──
  Huh...? Would that be like anko-filled donuts...?)
(──The one that looks delicious in reality!)
